Tokens.text: Congratulations on surviving high school and turning 18! Your parents have kicked you out of the house to use your room for storage. Now, it’s time to face the real word and make a living. To get a job, you must first meet all the requirements like education. Let’s see if you can beat the other competitors in the job market and survive. Don’t forget that it will cost you different amounts of coins to meet everyday necessities like food and a place to sleep.
Choose between Black and White to select which fate awaits you.
Your family has never had debt before. Today, they told you that they have decided to invest in you and gave you 700 coins to start you off. Can you survive 2 weeks?
Use the arrow keys to walk and the mouse to interact.

It's getting pretty late, and you need shelter for the night. Now you can choose between staying at a nice and safe hotel for $50, staying at a sketchy motel for $20, and sleeping on the streets with a chance of being mugged and left to die.
You survived one night, but you need a place to stay again tonight. Your options aren't permanent - how could they be, when you have no credit with the bank, much less a bank card?

Once again, you look through your options for tonight (hotel, motel, streets) but then you realize there's an event in the town tonight, and the police is extra vigilant. The streets aren't safe to sleep in. You could try, but it's very likely that you'd be caught. Everything is much more expensive due to the event. Hotel is $100, motel is $60, and the fine for sleeping out in the streets is a ghastly $250 (that is, if you get caught).
You survived two nights, but you need a place to stay again tonight. Your options still aren't permanent, unfortunately.

Yet again, you look through your options for tonight (hotel, motel, streets). The event yesterday finally ended, and the town is pretty empty once more. Prices are down again, with the hotel being $50 and the motel at $20. Police is nowhere to be seen.
Do you want to stay in the

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"starve for the night","starve for the night"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"starve for the night","starve for the night")
You're safe for the night. But how long will this safety last?
Someone knocks on your door in the middle of the night.

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"pretend not to hear anything","motel close door"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"pretend not to hear anything","motel close door")
You find an empty doorway of a shop and plan on spending the night there. But just as you're about to set your meagre belongings down, someone else pushes past you and beats you to the spot.
A heavily built man stands in your doorway. He is holding something in his fist, but you are unable to see what it is exactly. It looks sharp.

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"politely ask him to leave","motel close door"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"politely ask him to leave","motel close door")

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"shut the door in his face","angry man"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"shut the door in his face","angry man")

tokens.innerText: shut the door in his face

Tokens.text: Footsteps echo along the hallway outside your door. Whoever was outside your door has left for now.
You shut the door in his face without saying anything. He starts pounding angrily on the door, and all of a sudden the door breaks down.
He comes for you. You finally see what he's holding in his hand. It's a short dagger.
He holds you up by your throat. You can feel yourself
You start arguing with the other person about who got there first. The other person shakes their fist at you.
You find somewhere else. Thankfully, it is unclaimed, and you quickly claim it as your own and barricade it with scraps you find around you.
You land the punch, and the other person takes one look at you and runs away, leaving their belongings behind.
There is $20 inside their bag. You seem to be
You miss the punch. The person punches you in the jaw, the eye and the throat. You feel yourself
You move into your motel room for the night. Unfortunately, since the rooms are so overbooked, you have to share your room with a stranger.
When you get into your room, it's initially empty and you breathe a sigh of relief. However, this doesn't last long.
Halfway through the night, just as you are about to fall asleep, the door opens with a loud bang, and your... roommate saunters in drunkenly.
At least, you hope it's your roommate.

You chose to sleep on the streets. Very, very risky move indeed. Out of the corner of your eye, you can see multiple police officers patrolling the streets, occasionally finding people sleeping on the streets and taking those people away.
Do you choose to find a spot inside
You choose a secluded spot in the park to settle down for the night. Just as you lay down on your blankets, a wild dog appears from the darkness and starts growling menacingly at you.

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"throw the dog whatever food you have","angry dog"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"throw the dog whatever food you have","angry dog")

tokens.innerText: throw the dog whatever food you have
tokens.text: "throw the dog whatever food you have"

Tokens.text: You decide to find a back alley to sleep inside for the night.

Just as you bring your blankets over yourself, a bright light envelops you, and a microphone-enhanced voice tells you the police is taking you into custody, and you have to hand over a $250 fine to bail yourself out.
for the night, but you're also $250 poorer.
It doesn't work. The dog leaps towards you, and takes a good chunk out of your leg. With no meds, no money, and no-one to ask for help, you
You ignore the drunken roommate. Thankfully, they don't really do anything apart from singing loudly and falling into their bed, asleep.

You start being angry at your roommate for being loud. Punches are suddenly thrown. Your roommate overpowers you and suffocates you in your bed. Realizing what they've done, they run away in the night. You, on the other hand, aren't so
You decide to stay in the motel for the night.

When you arrive in your room, you realize quickly that your door does NOT lock. Whilst this normally would not be an issue, you heard gunshots multiple times throughout the day in the general area of the motel.

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"do nothing and hope for the best","unlocked door"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"do nothing and hope for the best","unlocked door")

tokens.innerText: do nothing and hope for the best
tokens.text: "do nothing and hope for the best"

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"try to barricade the door with heavy objects","barricaded door"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"try to barricade the door with heavy objects","barricaded door")

tokens.innerText: try to barricade the door with heavy objects
tokens.text: "try to barricade the door with heavy objects"

Tokens.text: You decide to stay on the streets for the night.
While you're deliberating where exactly to settle in, a street gang starts approaching you menacingly.
You decide to stand your ground against the approaching gang members.
One of them cracks her knuckles and adopts a fighting stance. Another goes to the front and directly tells you to either give them all your money willingly or suffer.
You decide to surrender all of your cash to the gang.

However, they do not leave you alone. They laugh derisively at the cash you just handed them - apparently, that is not enough to satisfy their leader's needs, so they give you a few hard kicks to the ribs for making them suffer their leader's wrath.
You hear a few bones crack. Breathing becomes hard... and you
You attempt to run, but they are faster and stronger. They catch you, but not before one gang member makes a cutthroat motion to another. That's the last thing you see before you
The door remains unlocked, and you go to sleep.
Halfway through the night, around 3 AM, a masked person comes in and fires five shots. Two of them pierce through your body. They then leave, and you are left to
You barricade the door to the best of your ability, and then you go to sleep.
Footsteps echo in the hallway all night, and you hear a couple of more gunshots, but no one manages to enter your room,
You somehow managed to survive for three nights. You need a place to stay again tonight.

You look through your options for tonight (hotel, motel, streets). The town is eerily quiet tonight. Prices are at their lowest, with the hotel being $30 and the motel at $10. Police is, again, nowhere to be seen.
Do you want to stay in the
You decide to stay at the motel.
It IS pretty quiet tonight, and that's odd. The motel is usually bustling with activity, whether it be illicit or legal.

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"stay up late to keep watch","stay up late"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"stay up late to keep watch","stay up late")

tokens.innerText: stay up late to keep watch

Tokens.text: You decide to live on the streets. It's actually pretty
tonight. Seems like you got lucky.
You decide to stay up late to keep watch.
All of a sudden, you hear a steady tap, tap that comes from the hallway.
You grab the nearest object to you, which is a...
Someone barges into your room, and you immediately swing the lamp at them. They fall unconscious to the ground, and you run without thinking.
Someone barges into your room, giving you no time to react. Your pen falls to the ground.
Sketchy motels are sketchy for a reason.
One more night, and you'll be able to stay with your friend, who will be coming back in town tomorrow.
Time to look through your options for tonight.

For some reason, the town has become attractive to tourists overnight, and the accommodations in the town are once again experiencing price surges. One hotel room is $70 (ridiculous), and one motel room is $50 (even more ridiculous).
Staying on the streets is risky, but you don't think the police will be patrolling again.
Do you want to stay in the
You choose to stay at the motel for your last night.
Somehow, the motel gets sketchier every single time you get there. How spooky.
You decide to sleep on the streets for your final day alone.
Once again, you have the choice between
The room smells musky, like sweat and unwashed clothing.

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"thinking about the future","thinking about the future"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"thinking about the future","thinking about the future")

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"go straight to bed","go straight to bed"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"go straight to bed","go straight to bed")
The room smells overly sweet, like your aunt's perfume when she's drunk.

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"thinking about the future","thinking about the future"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"thinking about the future","thinking about the future")

Tokens.innerText: link-goto:"go straight to bed","go straight to bed"
Tokens.name: linkgoto
Tokens.text: (link-goto:"go straight to bed","go straight to bed")
You spend quite some time thinking about your future.
Being kicked out of the house felt really bad, but you have high hopes for the future, especially now that you've survived 4.5 days.
You go straight to bed, thinking about nothing in particular, but expecting to wake up to a brighter future.
Congratulations, you have managed to survive all five days!
Your belly fills up. It feels really, really nice to have food in your stomach again.
You starve for the night. You're getting weaker... and weaker.
